node.title: Publican urges thief to 'surreptitiously' return baby Jesus to avoid bad karma
node.alt: Three wise men in robes along with Mary in a red rob inside a straw hut.
node.description: The hunt is on in Orange for a thief who stole baby Jesus in a manger from a nativity scene on display at the Metropolitan Hotel.
node.content:
["A publican in the New South Wales Central West has pleaded for the thief who stole baby Jesus in a manger from a nativity scene at her pub\u00a0to return it.", "Metropolitan Hotel owner\u00a0Joanne Murphy said the thief likely struck over the weekend but the missing piece was not noticed until earlier this week.\u00a0", "\"The wise men are still there and Mary is still there, even though she's not looking great but someone actually stole the baby Jesus in his crib,\" Ms Murphy said.", "The Orange-based publican said she was shocked someone had stolen the decorations.", "\"My son had said, 'Well Mum, if you are going to put it up there, someone might steal it,' and I said, 'No, no, no-one will steal that. It is a good thing to have, it is the true meaning of Christmas'.", "", "
The pub's owners have implored the thief to return the missing piece.(ABC Central West: Hamish Cole)
", "\"It was sort of old. It is not a new, shiny, exciting object.\u00a0I thought no-one would steal that but of course, there are obviously people who don't care in town which is really sad.\u00a0", "\"So when I found out I was really upset.\"\u00a0", "Ms Murphy said the Christmas decorations had immense sentimental value to her family.\u00a0", "\"It was just a nice ode to him to say well he's there and he's watching us.\"\u00a0", "", "
The Metropolitan Hotel celebrates Christmas every year with an array of decorations.(ABC Central West: Hamish Cole)
", "
Community campaign launched
", "The publican said she appreciated the community's efforts toward\u00a0locating the baby Jesus and hoped it would be home before Christmas.\u00a0", "\"Some of the locals are a little bit upset about it on my behalf which is lovely and we have had people trying to follow it up.\u00a0", "\"I haven't quite gone down to the police station and reported it but I would just hope that it gets out there and whoever stole it will surreptitiously put it back there.", "\"Then maybe they won't get bad karma and might feel a bit better about themselves.\""]
